title: kanugoni dhanyuDaitini
sahitya:
kanugoni dhanyuDaitini shrI kanci kAmAkSi nIdu mUrtini 
kanula paNDavuga I bhrgu vAsaramuna brahmAdi vinuta caraNayugaLa


caraNam 1    kamsamavENi kalyANi shukapANi bhUbONi EkAmrEshurANi 
ina shashi nayanE shashAnkAbharaNE caNDa mahiSAdya suradamani
vibudha sannutE suguNAbharaNE krpArdra hrdayAgahara guha janani
gauri jalaja nayanE jitamarALa gamanE rAjavadanE shrI lalitE
    caraNam 2    ardha candra sama kumkuma rEkhAncita phAlE mukura sama kapOlE 
aviraLa pIna kuca yugaLE vara shankhagaLE bAlE gAnalOlE
sarva manOhari pItAmbari shubhakari sadAshiva kavi sukhakari
sarasavANi mUkAdi bhakta pOSaNi kAmakOTi pITha vAsini
